oai_dc:dc.dc:title: organic agriculture in Syria : policy options
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Santucci, Fabio M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
Policy environments and social economy
History of organics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The author analyses present difficulties of conventional agriculture in Syria. Market opportunities, in Syria and abroad, are illustrated. Possible actions and participatory approach are thus covered.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Santucci, Fabio M. (2010) organic agriculture in Syria : policy options. NEW MEDIT, IX (1), pp. 47-53.
